ethToTokenTransferInput(uint256,uint256,.details: Buys at least `minTokensBought` tokens with ETH and transfer them      to `recipient`.

params.minTokensBought: The minimum number of tokens to buy.
params.recipient: Who to transfer the tokens to.

tokenToEthSwapInput(uint256,uint256,uint.details: Buys at least `minEthBought` ETH with tokens.

params.minEthBought: The minimum amount of ETH to buy.

tokenToTokenTransferInput(uint256,uint25.details: Buys at least `minTokensBought` tokens with the exchange token      and transfer them to `recipient`.

params.minEthBought: The minimum amount of intermediate ETH to buy.
params.minTokensBought: The minimum number of tokens to buy.
params.recipient: Who to transfer the tokens to.
